<image>

<image>
<image>
<image>
In the Google Drive app, create a new folder called Dreams and Aspirations.

Click on button with the function of "Create"
Click on button with the function of "Folder"
Click on point (994,2001)
Type text: Dreams and Aspirations
Click on button with the text "Create"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I want to go to Manage Google Drive storage in the Google Drive app so I can see how much storage is being utilised and when my storage will run out.

Click on button with the text "Back"
Click on button with the text "More navigation options"
Click on button with the text "Settings"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I want to restore the screenshot.txt file from the trash in the Google Drive app.

Click on button with the text "More navigation options"
Click on button with the text "Trash"
Click on button with the function of "More actions for screenshot.txt"
Click on button with the text "Restore"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>
I want to save all of my personal documents on the drive in one location. Create a Personal File folder in the Google Drive app.

Click on button with the function of "Create"
Click on button with the function of "Folder"
Type text: Personal File
Click on button with the text "Create"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
I must use the Google Drive app to view the Dinner-Vegetable PDF file.

Click on point (410,465)
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
<image>

<image>
<image>
Export all the reminders in the google drive app

Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Open navigation drawer"
Click on button with the text "06/13/2023  11:15 PM"
Click on button with the text "Take Backup"
Click on point (403,2119)
Click on button with the text "Save"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
<image>
I need Book Report.pptx, so I want to download Book Report.pptx file to my device in the Google Drive app.

Click on point (988,692)
Click on button with the text "Download"
Check status: successful

<image>
<image>
I want to read the DIY tool kit file, so use the Google Drive app to view the DIY tool kit file.

Click on button with the text "Diy tool kit"
Check status: successful

In order to have a backup, export all of the reminders in the Google Drive app in file format.

Go back to the previous page
Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "Open navigation drawer"
Click on button with the text "Backup & Restore"
Click on button with the text "Take Backup"
Click on point (123,2129)
Click on button with the function of "Show dropdown menu"
Click on point (540,1566)
Click on button with the text "Save"
Check status: successful

<image>

<image>
<image>
<image>
In order to have a backup, export all of the reminders in the Google Drive app in file format.

Click on button with the text "Open"
Click on button with the text "Thu, Sep 28, 2023"
Click on button with the text "Take Backup"
Wait for response
Check status: successful

<image>

I want to go to Manage your Google Drive storage in the Google Drive app so I can see how much storage is being utilised and when my storage will run out.

Go back to the previous page
Click on button with the text "More navigation options"
Click on button with the text "dance steps and positions.pdf"
Scroll down
Check status: successful

Click on button with the text "My Drive"
Click on button with the text "Memories"
Click on button with the text "Select"

Click on button with the text "Restore"
